name: Coxinha: The Legend of a new Hero
name_original: Coxinha: The Legend of a new Hero
description:
Inside of a great empire there were 5 kingdoms that constantly clashed in wars for territory and to decide who was dominant over who. The emperor even with all his resources couldn’t maintain order between the races, until someone who was capable to put an end to the chaos arose, this being was called ‘the great hero’. Years later his disappearance, once again the kingdoms were engulfed in conflict. A youngling was chosen among their people to have a chance to be the new hero.

 This game is not for saving princesses.
